title: RepeteFloent
description: A web application designed to help users practice translation skills. It includes features like text translation, hints, progress tracking, and a timer.

title: Stellar Showdown
description: A space-themed singleplayer about shooting down asteroids. This game was made for the Raylib Asteriod themed GameJam.

title: Report Tracking System
description: A system designed to track, manage, and display reports for technicians. It allows technicians to view reports in a workspace, with features like real-time updates, priority tagging, and status tracking.

title: Password Manager
description: A project made to participate in the bahrain hackathon. The application allows the user to safely store their passwords locally and back them up.
